imdb.title: Yuri!!! On Ice
imdb.plot: After suffering defeat, Yuri Katsuki hangs up his ice skates for good. But will an encounter with two top skaters reignite his passion?

episodes.title: Easy as Pirozhki!! The Grand Prix Final of Tears
episodes.plot: Yuri Katsuki is a figure skater chasing his dream of achieving gold in the Grand Prix finals.

episodes.title: Two Yuris?! Drama at Yu-topia
episodes.plot: Katasuki Yuri is at a crossroads after suffering a miserable defeat at the Grand Prix Finals. Uncertain whether to retire or to continue, Yuri holes up in his family home. However, a chance circumstance causes him to catch the eye of five-time world champion Victor Nikiforov

episodes.title: I Am Eros, and Eros Is Me?! Face-Off! Hot Springs on Ice
episodes.plot: The two Yuris are to face off in Hot Springs on Ice where they will each debut a short program choreographed by Victor--one to Eros, and one to Agape. Victor claims he will do whatever the winner wants, but...

episodes.title: Like Yourself... And Complete the Free Program!!
episodes.plot: The two Yuris begin to choreograph their free skate programs at their respective rinks. In Japan, Yuri feels hesitant to pursue what it means to be uniquely him, but he begins to untangle his past by talking to Victor.

episodes.title: Face Beet-Red!! It's the First Competition! The Chugoku, Shikoku, and Kyushu Championship
episodes.plot: It is time for Yuri's first competition of the season, but Victor's the center of attention as his first competition as a coach. Already anxious, Yuri's nerves don't get a break when Minami Kenjiro, the skater who beat Yuri at last year's nationals, confronts him.

episodes.title: China's On! The Grand Prix Series Opening Event!! The Cup of China Short Program
episodes.plot: The Cup of China, a Grand Prix Series event, is here! Realizing that he is the man who took Victor from the world, Yuri gets worked up before his performance. Victor is concerned to see Yuri this way for the first time.

episodes.title: China's On! The Grand Prix Series Opening Event!! The Cup of China Free Skate
episodes.plot: Yuri performs his free skate program at the cup of China after an emotional conversation with Viktor.

episodes.title: Yuri vs Yuri! The Horror!! Rostelecom Cup, Short Program
episodes.plot: Yuri is determined to show his love to all of Russia in the Rostelecom Cup, the final event of the Grand Prix Series. In contrast, Yurio feels bogged down by his ties to Moscow, and tries to shrug them off. Before them, however, rises JJ, a rising star from North America.

episodes.title: Yuri vs Yuri! The Horror!! Rostelecom Cup, Free Skate
episodes.plot: With Victor's fading warmth in his heart, Yuri goes out to the rink for his free skate that will determine whether he'll qualify for the Grand Prix Final. Yurio firms his own resolve after eating special pirozhki, the epitome of love in Moscow.

episodes.title: Gotta Supercharge It! Pre-Grand Prix Final Special!
episodes.plot: Barcelona is where the fated final battle will take place. Sightseeing during their free time, Victor is oblivious to Yuri's resolve. Then, a chance remark reveals a nightmarish event at the banquet last year for Yuri.

episodes.title: Gotta Super-Supercharge It!! Grand Prix Final Short Program
episodes.plot: Now armed with the light of love on his finger along with Victor, Yuri goes for the gold in the Grand Prix Final as the chosen six competitors clash in the short program.

episodes.title: Gotta Super-Super-Supercharge It! Grand Prix Final Free Skate
episodes.plot: Yuri's words trigger a debate that results in Yuri appearing at the free skate event in his worst condition ever. Can Yuri succeed in skating a program with the highest technical difficulty at their last event together to show the world the love he shares with Victor? What will each conclude once the program is over and it is time to decide their paths after the Grand Prix Final?
